Initializer# init(device:destinationDataType:seed:distributionDescriptor:)

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.15+tvOS 13.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
init(
    device: any MTLDevice,
    destinationDataType: MPSDataType,
    seed: Int,
    distributionDescriptor: MPSMatrixRandomDistributionDescriptor
)
```
